list.notice:
This is not an application. You will need to apply for benefits with each agency.

We do not share, save, or submit your information.

list.item: You need to visit each agency’s website to find full eligibility requirements and apply.
Your results may vary if your situation or answers change.

cta.link: Clear your answers and restart the form.

banner.heading: Your potential benefits
banner.description: Visit each agency to find true eligibility and to apply. Check with your city, state, or employer for other benefits.

eligible.heading: Results
eligible.description: You may be eligible for these benefits:

banner.heading: Benefits you did not qualify for
banner.description: According to your answers you are not eligible for these benefits.

notEligible.heading: Results
notEligible.description: Based on your answers you are not eligible for these benefits.You may become eligible if you enter additional information or your situation changes.

banner.heading: You are likely not eligible for these benefits.
banner.description: If you think you reached these results by mistake, please go back to review and edit your answers.

banner.heading: Benefits you did not qualify for
banner.description: According to your answers you are not eligible for these benefits.

zeroBenefits.heading: No eligible results.
zeroBenefits.description: Based on your answers, you are currently not eligible for this life event’s benefits. You may become eligible if your situation or answers change in the future. Visit your city, state, or employer for other potential benefits.

eligibleResults.heading: Results
eligibleResults.description: You may be eligible for these benefits.

notEligibleResults.heading: Benefits you did not qualify for
notEligibleResults.description: Based on your answers you are not eligible for these benefits. You may become eligible if you enter additional information or your situation changes.
notEligibleResults.cta: Explore benefits you did not qualify for

shareResults.heading: Share results
shareResults.description: Copy or email these results. Your answers will be visible. Only share with those you trust.

shareResults.heading: Share results
shareResults.description: Your information will be viewable. Only share with those you trust.

date.alert: Date should follow the format January 19 2000
